results.original: A House Divided
results.translation: 分崩离析

importHistory.to: 分崩离析
A House Divided

results.original: This society went through a major crisis during its early expansion. With its first colonies settled and developed, and its vision outward bound for the next step into the endless void, treachery hit them unprepared as one colony declared its independence. With their weakness and inability to react now laid bare for all to see, their other colony soon seized upon the opportunity to revolt as well.
results.translation: 这个社会在发展初期经历了一场大危机。就在它的第一批殖民地建立发展，初步向外拓展进入无尽虚空之时，背信弃义的殖民地宣布了独立，令其措手不及。其弱点和无能的反应一览无余，另一个殖民地迅速抓住了叛乱的机会。

importHistory.to: 这个社会在发展初期经历了一场大危机。随着它的第一批殖民地的建立和发展，以及它向外拓展进入无尽虚空的第一步，当一个殖民地宣布独立时，背信弃义打击了他们的措手不及。他们的弱点和无能反应现在暴露在大家的面前，他们的另一个殖民地很快也抓住了反抗的机会。

This society went through a major crisis during its early expansion. With its first colonies settled and developed, and its vision outward bound for the next step into the endless void, treachery hit them unprepared as one colony declared its independence. With their weakness and inability to react now laid bare for all to see, their other colony soon seized upon the opportunity to revolt as well.

results.original: Splinter Colony
results.translation: 分裂的殖民地

importHistory.to: 分裂的殖民地
Splinter Colony

results.original: This society started out as colonists under their mother nation. Whether it was perceived oppression, political opportunism or simply a strong will to forge its own destiny, this former colony renounced its homeworld's administration and declared independence.
results.translation: 这个社会最初是在他们的母国统治下的殖民地。不管它被认为是压迫、政治机会主义，还是仅仅是一种打造自己命运的强烈意愿，这个前殖民地都放弃了母国的管理，宣布独立。

importHistory.to: 这个社会最初是在他们的母国统治下的殖民地。不管它被认为是压迫、政治机会主义，还是仅仅是一种打造自己命运的强烈意愿，这个前殖民地都放弃了母国的管理，宣布独立。

This society started out as colonists under their mother nation. Whether it was perceived oppression, political opportunism or simply a strong will to forge its own destiny, this former colony renounced its homeworld's administration and declared independence.

results.original:
Since the earliest times, our people reached for ever greater goals. We fought wild beasts, tamed the lands, built great cities and spread across our world.
Eventually with the invention of hyperdrive technology we went on to reach for the stars. During our early expansion, small colonies grew to become new homes for our people and a foundation for what was to come. Yet as our eyes lay on the endless sea of the void with worlds just waiting to be claimed, we were betrayed. With our military unprepared for such an event, we could only watch as our colonies declared themselves independent, shattering our plans. We have been in a state of cold war with them ever since. But this madness will end now.

A house divided cannot stand. Unity must be achieved, be it by diplomacy or military force. We will not be denied our destiny!
results.translation:
自古以来，我们的人民就追求更大的目标。我们与野兽搏斗，驯服土地，建造伟大的城市，遍布世界各地。
最终，随着超空间引擎技术的发明，我们开始探索星空。在我们早期的扩张中，殖民地成长为我们人民的新家园和未来的基础。然而，当我们的目光落在无尽的虚空之海，世界正等着我们去探索，我们却遭到了背叛。我们的军队对这样的事件毫无准备，我们只能眼睁睁地看着我们的殖民地宣布独立，粉碎我们的计划。从那以后，我们一直与他们处于冷战状态。但这种疯狂现在将会结束。

分裂的家不能持久。团结必须实现，无论是通过外交手段还是军事力量。我们的命运不会被否定！

results.translation: 断绝

Severance

results.original: Prior to discovering the hyperlane network, this civilization found a wormhole within its home system and managed to establish an outpost on the other side. Unfortunately, it turned unstable shortly after and manned travel through it became too dangerous, separating homeworld and colony.
results.translation: 在发现超空间航道之前，这个文明在它的主星系中发现了一个虫洞，并设法在另一边建立了一个前哨站。不幸的是，不久之后它就变得不稳定了，载人穿越它变得太危险了，把“家园”和“殖民地”分开了。

importHistory.to: 在发现超空间航道之前，这个文明在它的主星系中发现了一个虫洞，并设法在另一边建立了一个前哨站。不幸的是，不久之后它就变得不稳定了，载人穿越它变得太危险了，把“家园”和“殖民地”分开了。

Prior to discovering the hyperlane network, this civilization found a wormhole within its home system and managed to establish an outpost on the other side. Unfortunately, it turned unstable shortly after and manned travel through it became too dangerous, separating homeworld and colony.

results.original: Begin with a wormhole in your home system and a colony on the other side, but no means to safely travel through it.
results.translation: 游戏开始时在你的家园星系有一个虫洞，殖民地在虫洞在另一边，但没有办法安全通过它。

importHistory.to: 游戏开始时在你的家园星系有一个虫洞，殖民地在虫洞在另一边，但没有办法安全通过它。
Begin with a wormhole in your home system and a colony on the other side, but no means to safely travel through it.

results.original:
Our civilization prospered on [GetHomeWorldName] for a long time, but our people always felt that our destiny lay out there in the void. Early space exploration limited to our home system by primitive STL-drives yielded an extraordinary discovery. A wormhole connected our system to another further away than we could ever hope to reach by conventional means. Scouts where sent, followed by a colony ship heading for a planet now known as [event_target:mom_severance_colony.GetName]. It was a dream come true, though as any dream it didn't last.

The wormhole became unstable shortly after our colony's founding. Experts still debate whether it was ever stable to begin with, or whether we'd just been lucky. Many lives were lost when another wave of colonists failed to reach the other side and further manned travel through it was deemed too dangerous. However, communication is still possible, but supplies sent through it have only a 30% expectancy to reach their destination. This separation left us in a precarious situation.

But now, after the discovery of the hyperlane network, the finest minds of the [GetName] have finished the development of the first hyperdrives. We are finally able to reach other stars and hopefully our colony as well.
results.translation:
我们的文明在[GetHomeWorldName]上繁荣了很长一段时间，但是我们的人民总是觉得我们的命运就在那里。早期的空间探索局限于我们的家园星系，但原始的STL引擎产生了一个非凡的发现。一个虫洞将我们的星系与另一个星系连接起来，这个星系比我们希望通过传统方式能够到达的距离更远。我们派出侦察船，然后派出一艘殖民地船前往现在被称为[event_target:mom_severance_colony.GetName]的星球。梦想成真了，但它如同梦想一般，它没有持续多久。

虫洞在我们的殖民地建立后不久就不稳定了。专家们仍在争论它是否一开始就很稳定，还是我们只是运气好。当另一波殖民者没能到达另一边的时候，许多人失去了生命，而通过另一边的载人旅行被认为太危险了。然而，通信仍然是可能的，但通过它发送的物资只有30%的预期到达目的地。这种分离使我们处于危险的境地。

但是现在，在发现了超空间网络之后，[GetName]最优秀的头脑已经完成了第一个超空间引擎的开发。我们终于能够到达其他星球，希望也能到达我们的殖民地。

results.translation: 分裂的文明

importHistory.to: 分裂的文明
Breakaway Civilization

results.original: Still fractured into various nation states, this civilization made its first steps on the way to become spacefaring after the discovery of an ancient alien wreckage. Unbeknownst by its rivals or even its own population, one of the worlds superpowers began reverse engineering the alien technology in secrecy.
results.translation: 尽管仍分裂成不同的民族国家，但在发现古代外星人残骸后，这一文明在向太空旅行迈进的道路上迈出了第一步。世界上的一个超级大国秘密地开始对外星技术进行逆向工程，它的对手甚至自己的人民都不知道。

importHistory.to: 尽管仍分裂成不同的民族国家，但在发现古代外星人残骸后，这一文明在向太空旅行迈进的道路上迈出了第一步。世界上的一个超级大国秘密地开始对外星技术进行逆向工程，它的对手甚至自己的人民都不知道。

Still fractured into various nation states, this civilization made its first steps on the way to become spacefaring after the discovery of an ancient alien wreckage. Unbeknownst by its rivals or even its own population, one of the worlds superpowers began reverse engineering the alien technology in secrecy.

results.original: Begin with fewer pops but the potential of planetary unification, which if achieved provides access to the workforce and natural resources of the other nation states.\nBeware the looming threat of nuclear war and try to ease the tensions...\nOr face the consequences of your mistakes...
results.translation: 游戏开始时只有少量人口，但要努力实现全球统一，如果能够实现，就可以获得其他国家的劳动力和自然资源。\n核战争和缓解紧张局势的威胁是否迫在眉睫?\n或者面对你所犯错误的后果……

importHistory.to: 游戏开始时只有少量人口，但要努力实现全球统一，如果能够实现，就可以获得其他国家的劳动力和自然资源。\n核战争和缓解紧张局势的威胁是否迫在眉睫?\n或者面对你所犯错误的后果……

Begin with fewer pops but the potential of planetary unification, which if achieved provides access to the workforce and natural resources of the other nation states.\nBeware the looming threat of nuclear war and try to ease the tensions...\nOr face the consequences of your mistakes...

results.original:
[GetHomeWorldName] is a fractured world, divided between various superpowers. Wars dominated our history, but the splitting of the atom and its derived weapons of mass destruction changed everything.

Though major conflicts have ceased under the threat of mutually assured destruction, we are living in a state of cold war and tensions are higher than ever before.

But even in these trying times, we have been blessed with good fortune. A discovery has been made in a desolate and sparsely populated area under our dominion - a strange vessel which must have crashed there eons ago. Scientists believe it to be of alien origin and posit that it was once capable of interstellar travel. Thanks to the remote location of this finding, we were able to keep it a secret not only from the broad public but also from our rivals.

Today we will reap the fruits of years of development and research and clandestine operations to establish outposts in our solar system. The [GetName] might not know it yet, but future history books will speak of this day as the beginning of a new age, as we send out our first explorational vessel to another star.
results.translation:
[GetHomeWorldName]是一个分裂的世界，被多个超级大国瓜分。战争主宰了我们的历史，但原子的分裂及其衍生的大规模杀伤性武器改变了一切。

虽然重大冲突在相互保证毁灭的威胁下已经停止，但我们仍然生活在冷战状态中，紧张局势比以往任何时候都更加严重。

但即使在这些艰难的时刻，我们也被祝福有好运气。在我们管辖的一个人烟稀少的荒无人烟的地区发现了一艘奇怪的飞船，它一定是在很久以前撞沉的。科学家们相信它来自外星，并假设它曾经能够进行星际旅行。由于这一发现地点偏远，我们不仅能够对广大公众保密，而且对我们的竞争对手也保密。

今天，我们将收获多年发展、研究和秘密行动的成果，在我们的太阳系建立前哨站。[GetName]可能还不知道，但未来的历史书将把这一天称为一个新时代的开始，因为我们将向另一颗恒星发射我们的第一艘探索飞船。

Thanks to the remote location of this finding, we were able to keep it a secret not only from the broad public but also from our rivals.

Today we will reap the fruits of years of development and research and clandestine operations to establish outposts in our solar system. The [GetName] might not know it yet, but future history books will speak of this day as the beginning of a new age, as we send out our first explorational vessel to another star.

results.original: Divine Guidance
results.translation: 神的指引

importHistory.to: 神的指引
Divine Guidance

results.original: In the distant past, a soul blessed by the divine with unnatural longevity and intellect rose to power. Regarded as a god among their people for their psionic gift and charismatic nature, this heavenly ruler guided this civilization through the ages.
results.translation: 在遥远的过去，一个被神祝福的灵魂以不自然的长寿和智慧获得了力量。由于他的精神天赋和超凡的自然魅力，他被视为人民的神，这位神圣的统治者指导了这个文明的各个时代。

importHistory.to: 在遥远的过去，一个被神祝福的灵魂以不自然的长寿和智慧获得了力量。由于他的精神天赋和超凡的自然魅力，他被视为人民的神，这位神圣的统治者指导了这个文明的各个时代。

In the distant past, a soul blessed by the divine with unnatural longevity and intellect rose to power. Regarded as a god among their people for their psionic gift and charismatic nature, this heavenly ruler guided this civilization through the ages.

results.original: Start with an average homeworld and an immortal ruler, chosen by the divine and blessed with unnatural charisma and intellect.
results.translation: 从一个普通的家园和一个不朽的统治者开始，他是天选之子，被赋予了非自然的魅力和智慧。

importHistory.to: 从一个普通的家园和一个不朽的统治者开始，他是天选之子，被赋予了非自然的魅力和智慧。
Start with an average homeworld and an immortal ruler, chosen by the divine and blessed with unnatural charisma and intellect.

results.original:
In the distant past, our people fought amongst themselves in a never-ending cycle of violence and retribution. We would still be caught in this madness today, had it not been for [Root.GetRulerTitle] [Root.GetRulerName].

When [ruler.GetSheHe] first revealed [ruler.GetHerselfHimself] to our ancestors, they were nothing more than savages. Yet [ruler.GetHerHis] charisma made them loyal followers of [ruler.GetHerHis] cause. Within a few decades, all [root.GetSpeciesNamePlural] had been united behind the [Root.GetRulerTitle], entering a new age of prosperity and progress under [ruler.GetHerHis] benevolent rule.

Today, on the 2200th anniversary of [Root.GetRulerTitle] [Root.GetRulerName]'s coronation, our civilization will also enter a new age of exploration as our first hyperspace-capable prototype starts its journey to discover distant worlds.
results.translation:
在遥远的过去，我们的人民在无休止的暴力和报复循环中自相残杀。如果没有[Root.GetRulerTitle]·[Root.GetRulerName]，我们今天仍然会陷入这种疯狂。

当[ruler.GetSheHe]第一次向我们的祖先揭示[ruler.GetHerselfHimself]时，他们只不过是野蛮人。然而[ruler.GetHerHis]的魅力使他们成为[ruler.GetHerHis]事业的忠实追随者。在几十年的时间里，所有[root.GetSpeciesNamePlural]都团结在[Root.GetRulerTitle]的背后，在[ruler.GetHerHis]的仁慈统治下进入了一个繁荣进步的新时代。

今天，在[Root.GetRulerTitle]·[Root.GetRulerName]加冕2200周年之际，我们的文明也将进入一个探索的新时代，我们的第一个超空间原型开始了探索遥远世界的旅程。

results.original: Exiles
results.translation: 流亡者

importHistory.to: 流亡者
Exiles

results.original: This civilization was founded by the survivors of a war long past, who were forced to flee with a ragtag fleet when their original homeworld was overrun by a mysterious foe.
results.translation: 这个文明是由很久以前的一场战争的幸存者建立的，当他们最初的家园被一个神秘的敌人蹂躏时，他们被迫带着一支破烂的舰队逃离。

importHistory.to: 这个文明是由很久以前的一场战争的幸存者建立的，当他们最初的家园被一个神秘的敌人蹂躏时，他们被迫带着一支破烂的舰队逃离。
This civilization was founded by the survivors of a war long past, who were forced to flee with a ragtag fleet when their original homeworld was overrun by a mysterious foe.

results.original: Start with an average homeworld and a quest to recover your ancient heritage.
results.translation: 从一个普通的家园开始，寻找你的古代遗产。

importHistory.to: 从一个普通的家园开始，寻找你的古代遗产。
Start with an average homeworld and a quest to recover your ancient heritage.

results.original: Since ancient times our legends tell the story of a doomed world - ravaged by a merciless foe - and our ancestors, who narrowly escaped their brethren's fate. A long flight from their homeworld in a ragtag fleet of freighters eventually led them to [GetHomeWorldName]. Ill equipped with what little they had left, a colony was founded. Much knowledge and technology was lost in the struggle and hardship of making this planet their new home.\n\nNow, over two millennia later, our civilization has recovered. Great cities have been built, the wilderness tamed, and we are finally ready to return to the stars.
results.translation: 自古以来，我们的传说就讲述了一个注定要灭亡的世界——被无情的敌人蹂躏，以及我们的祖先，他们侥幸逃脱了兄弟们的命运。一群破烂不堪的货船从他们的家乡经过长途飞行，最终把他们带到了[GetHomeWorldName]。他们装备简陋，所剩无几，于是建立了一个殖民地。许多知识和技术在使这个星球成为他们的新家的斗争和困难中丢失了。\n\n两千年后的今天，我们的文明已经复苏。伟大的城市已经建成，荒野已经被驯服，我们终于准备好重返星空。

results.original: Overcrowded
results.translation: 过度拥挤

importHistory.to: 过度拥挤
Overcrowded

results.original: This civilization faced with impending collapse due to overpopulation took its first steps into space not out of scientific curiosity or a perceived manifest destiny but out of sheer necessity to support its ever increasing number of citizens.
results.translation: 由于人口过剩，这一文明即将崩溃。人类向太空迈出第一步，不是出于对科学的好奇，也不是出于显而易见的天命，而是完全有必要支持其不断增长的人口。

results.original: Start with §Y65§! £pop£ Pops and multiple additional districts and buildings on your homeworld but also a negative modifier that can only be removed by turning the planet into an ecumenopolis. (Or when the colony is destroyed or owned by any gestalt consciousness empire)\nYou get both city district improvement technologies.
results.translation: 开始时拥有§Y65§! £pop£，在你的母星上有多个额外的区域和建筑，但同时也有一个负面修正，只能将星球变成都市星球消除。（或殖民地被摧毁、被任何格式塔意识帝国拥有）\n你可以获得两种城市区划改善技术。

importHistory.to: 从§Y65§! £pop£开始，持久性有机污染物和多个额外的地区和建筑物在你的家园，但也有一个负面的修改，只能删除，把地球变成一个生态都市。(或者当殖民地被任何完形意识帝国摧毁或拥有)\n你可以得到两种城市区域改善技术。

results.original:
Our civilization has come a long way from fighting off the hazards of our environment and wresting the resources needed to expand from the very ground upon which we stand today. In the ancient times our ancestors could not have imagined that one day [GetHomeWorldName] would cease to satiate the [root.GetSpeciesAdj] hunger for resources and even space to live.

During the past decades the problems became ever more obvious to all [root.GetSpeciesNamePlural]. Cities turned into monstrous travesties of their former self in a failing effort to accommodate the ever increasing number of citizens. With our research focused on finding ways of coping with this situation there appear to be fewer and fewer solutions to be found on [GetHomeWorldName].

Even the supplies provided by various outposts established throughout the solar system won't stall the inevitable collapse for long. The start of our first FTL-capable exploration vessel on its journey to a neighboring star does not happen out of scientific curiostiy or an ill perceived manifest destiny. It is a sheer necessity.
results.translation: 我们的文明在与环境的危害作斗争和从我们今天所立足的土地上夺取所需的资源方面已经取得了长足的进步。在古代，我们的祖先无法想象有一天 [GetHomeWorldName] 会不会不再满足 [root.GetSpeciesAdj] 对资源甚至生存空间的渴望。在过去的几十年里，这些问题变得越来越明显 [root.GetSpeciesNamePlural].城市变成了它们以前的样子，在容纳越来越多的市民方面的努力失败了。随着我们的研究集中在寻找应对这种情况的方法，能找到的解决办法越来越少[GetHomeWorldName].\n\n即使是遍布太阳系的各个前哨站所提供的补给也无法长久地阻止这一不可避免的崩溃。我们第一艘具备超光速能力的探索船开始前往邻近恒星的旅程，并不是出于科学上的好奇，也不是出于一种不好理解的天定命运。这是绝对必要的。

With our research focused on finding ways of coping with this situation there appear to be fewer and fewer solutions to be found on [GetHomeWorldName].

Even the supplies provided by various outposts established throughout the solar system won't stall the inevitable collapse for long. The start of our first FTL-capable exploration vessel on its journey to a neighboring star does not happen out of scientific curiostiy or an ill perceived manifest destiny. It is a sheer necessity.

results.original: Changed Climate
results.translation: 改变气候

importHistory.to: 改变气候
Changed Climate

results.original: Before the invention of the Hyperdrive, disaster struck the homeworld of this species. Weather it be through a meteorite, pollution or natural causes, the climate of this planet has been altered to something the biology of the natives is not equipped to deal with.
results.translation: 在超空间驱动器发明之前，灾难袭击了这个物种的家园。无论是由于陨石、污染还是自然原因，这个星球的气候已经被改变成当地人的生物学无法应对的东西。

Climate Catastrophe

results.original: Before the invention of the Hyperdrive, a great disaster struck this civilization's homeworld. While the exact nature of the disaster is unknown, it caused significant alteration to the climate of the planet, causing the climate to change into something that can be deadly for native life.
results.translation: 在超光速引擎发明之前，一场巨大的灾难袭击了这个文明的家园。虽然这场灾难的确切性质尚不清楚，但它对星球的气候造成了重大的变化，导致气候发生变化，对当地的生命可能是致命的。

results.original: Sometime in our past, [GetHomeWorldName] was altered far outside [ROOT.GetSpeciesName] tolerances. Whether by accident, natural causes, or intentional action has been lost in the years following the disaster. Regardless, the event killed billions of our people, those who could not find shelter or endure [GetHomeWorldName]'s changed climate, the countless who died from starvation as crop yields fell, or those slaughtered in the brutal wars over what remained.\n\nIn time, we built domed cities and subterranean catacombs to live in, and eventually we unified beneath a new flag. Now we are ready to reach distant stars, and we will take our knowledge of survival with us.
results.translation: 在我们过去的某个时候，[GetHomeWorldName] 在很远的地方被改变了 [ROOT.GetSpeciesName] 公差。无论是意外事故，自然原因，还是有意的行动已经失去了在灾难后的几年。无论如何，这一事件夺去了我们数十亿人的生命，那些无法找到避难所或忍受痛苦的人 [GetHomeWorldName]随着农作物产量的下降，无数的人死于饥饿，或者是那些在残酷的战争中被屠杀的人。\n\n随着时间的推移，我们建造了圆顶城市和地下墓穴居住，最终我们在一面新旗帜下统一了。现在我们已经准备好到达遥远的星球，我们将带着我们的生存知识。

results.original: Sometime in our past, [GetHomeWorldName] was altered far outside [ROOT.GetSpeciesName] tolerances. Whether by accident, natural causes, or intentional action has been lost in the years following the disaster. Regardless, the event killed billions of hive drones, those who could not find shelter or endure [GetHomeWorldName]'s changed climate, the countless who died from starvation as food production fell, or those who slaughtered each other as the wounded hive fought to heal and regain control..\n\nIn time, we built domed cities and subterranean catacombs to live in, and the hive healed until once more we covered [GetHomeWorldName]. Now we are ready to reach the stars, and we will take our knowledge of survival with us.
results.translation: 在我们过去的某个时候，[GetHomeWorldName] 在很远的地方被改变了 [ROOT.GetSpeciesName] 公差。无论是意外事故，自然原因，还是有意的行动已经失去了在灾难后的几年。无论如何，这一事件夺去了我们数十亿人的生命，那些无法找到避难所或忍受痛苦的人 [GetHomeWorldName]随着粮食产量的下降，无数人死于饥饿;当受伤的蜂房为恢复和控制而斗争时，无数人互相残杀。\n\n随着时间的推移，我们建造了圆顶城市和地下墓穴居住，蜂箱愈合，直到我们再次覆盖[GetHomeWorldName].现在我们已经准备好去摘星星了，我们将带着我们的生存知识。

results.original: Wormhole Junction
results.translation: 虫洞连接

importHistory.to: 虫洞连接
Wormhole Junction

results.original: Abnormal gravitic forces in this civilization's home system has caused a wormhole junction to appear. Its termini are in a constant state of flux, appearing and disappearing as the gravitic forces shift. The civilization developed the means to travel through wormhole junctions and managed to stabilized two termini even before they discovered conventional FTL travel.
results.translation: 在这个文明的家园系统中，异常的重力导致了虫洞连接的出现。它的终点处于不断变化的状态，随着重力的变化而出现和消失。文明发展了穿越虫洞连接的方法，甚至在他们发现常规超光速旅行之前就设法稳定了两个终点站。

importHistory.to: 在这个文明的家园系统中，异常的重力导致了虫洞连接的出现。它的终点处于不断变化的状态，随着重力的变化而出现和消失。文明发展了穿越虫洞连接的方法，甚至在他们发现常规超光速旅行之前就设法稳定了两个终点站。

Abnormal gravitic forces in this civilization's home system has caused a wormhole junction to appear. Its termini are in a constant state of flux, appearing and disappearing as the gravitic forces shift. The civilization developed the means to travel through wormhole junctions and managed to stabilized two termini even before they discovered conventional FTL travel.

results.original: Start with a wormhole junction with two termini in your home system and the ability to discover more.
results.translation: 从一个虫洞连接开始，在你的家园星系中有两个终点站和发现更多的能力。

importHistory.to: 从一个虫洞连接开始，在你的家园星系中有两个终点站和发现更多的能力。
Start with a wormhole junction with two termini in your home system and the ability to discover more.

results.translation: 露天开采运营

importHistory.to: 露天开采运营
Stripmining Operation

results.original: Minerals are being extracted on an industrial scale here.
results.translation: 这里正在进行大规模的矿物开采。

importHistory.to: 这里正在进行大规模的矿物开采。
Minerals are being extracted on an industrial scale here.

results.original: Problematic Overpopulation
results.translation: 人口过剩问题

importHistory.to: 人口过剩问题
Problematic Overpopulation

results.original: Overcrowded cities, struggling to accomodate the ever increasing number of citizens, criminal networks on the rise and unhealthy living conditions decrease most working outputs here.
results.translation: 拥挤的城市，难以容纳日益增长的公民数量，犯罪网络的增加和不健康的生活条件减少了这里的大部分工作产出。

importHistory.to: 拥挤的城市，难以容纳日益增长的公民数量，犯罪网络的增加和不健康的生活条件减少了这里的大部分工作产出。
Overcrowded cities, struggling to accomodate the ever increasing number of citizens, criminal networks on the rise and unhealthy living conditions decrease most working outputs here.

results.original: Consumer Goods Upkeep
results.translation: 消费品维护

importHistory.to: 消费品维护
Consumer Goods Upkeep

results.original: Divine Rule
results.translation: 神的规则

importHistory.to: 神的规则
Divine Rule

results.original: Our people are shaken by the loss of their leader
results.translation: 我们的人民因失去了他们的领袖而感到震惊

importHistory.to: 我们的人民因失去了他们的领袖而感到震惊
Our people are shaken by the loss of their leader

results.original: Resurrection Project
results.translation: 复活项目

importHistory.to: 复活项目
Resurrection Project

results.original: Cloning a mere animal - or normal person for that matter - is not that big a deal anymore considering our technological progress. Doing so with a being whose abilities rival that of a god, however, should be carried out with the utmost caution to minimize any possible risks. This project will form the foundation to achieve this goal.
results.translation: 考虑到我们的技术进步，克隆一只动物或者一个正常人已经不再是什么大事了。然而，对一个能力堪比神的存在这样做，应该以最大的谨慎将任何可能的风险最小化。该项目将为实现这一目标奠定基础。

importHistory.to: 考虑到我们的技术进步，克隆一只动物或者一个正常人已经不再是什么大事了。然而，对一个能力堪比神的存在这样做，应该以最大的谨慎将任何可能的风险最小化。该项目将为实现这一目标奠定基础。

Cloning a mere animal - or normal person for that matter - is not that big a deal anymore considering our technological progress. Doing so with a being whose abilities rival that of a god, however, should be carried out with the utmost caution to minimize any possible risks. This project will form the foundation to achieve this goal.

results.original: Societal Collapse
results.translation: 社会崩溃

importHistory.to: 社会崩溃
Societal Collapse

results.original: Following the news about the death of our beloved [root.GetRulerTitle], riots broke out. People are blaming the government for having failed to protect their leader. Violence rules the streets. The unity we once had is no more.
results.translation: 在我们心爱的[root.GetRulerTitle]死亡的消息传出后，骚乱爆发了。人们指责政府未能保护他们的领袖。暴力统治着街道。我们曾经拥有的团结不复存在。

importHistory.to: 在我们心爱的[root.GetRulerTitle]死亡的消息传出后，骚乱爆发了。人们指责政府未能保护他们的领袖。暴力统治着街道。我们曾经拥有的团结不复存在。

Following the news about the death of our beloved [root.GetRulerTitle], riots broke out. People are blaming the government for having failed to protect their leader. Violence rules the streets. The unity we once had is no more.
